title: UK and France to collaborate on AI following Horizon membership
description:
The UK and France have announced new funding initiatives and partnerships aimed at advancing global AI safety. The developments come in the wake of the UK’s association with Horizon Europe, a move that was broadly seen as putting the divisions of Brexit in the past and the repairing of relations for the good of the... Read more »

The post UK and France to collaborate on AI following Horizon membership appeared first on AI News.
